onKeepAliveMounted #

解决在keep-alive场景中，部分业务在 组件重新激活时需要重新刷新的场景

  • keep-alive 场景
    • 初次进入组件
      • onMounted
    • 再次进入组件
      • onActivated

Usage #

vue

<script setup lang="ts">
import {onKeepAliveMounted} from '@vrx/core'

/**
 * 刷新数据的方法
 */
const refresh = () => {
  return Promise.reject()
}
onKeepAliveMounted(() => {
  refresh()
})
</script>


<script setup lang="ts">
import {onKeepAliveMounted} from '@vrx/core'

/**
 * 刷新数据的方法
 */
const refresh = () => {
  return Promise.reject()
}
onKeepAliveMounted(() => {
  refresh()
})
</script>

Type Declarations #

ts
/**
 * 在<keep-alive>中持续触发初始化
 * @param fn
 */
declare function onKeepAliveMounted(fn: Fn): void;

/**
 * 在<keep-alive>中持续触发初始化
 * @param fn
 */
declare function onKeepAliveMounted(fn: Fn): void;
